component.name: InhibitScreensaver
component.summary: A small utility to run your applications and games with to enable screensave blocking from within Flatpak (on Wayland)

description.p: A small utility to run your applications and games with to enable screensave blocking from within Flatpak (on Wayland).
To use just put inhibit-screensaver %command% in your game/application launch command after installing this and restarting Steam if it was running during the installation.
